meanings.definition: A component that is part of a larger system or structure.
meanings.sent1: The engine is a crucial subcomponent of the car.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check all the subcomponents before assembling the machine.
meanings.sent3: The subcomponent decided to take a break from the big machine.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was a subcomponent of her success.
meanings.sent5: The subcomponent, like a puzzle piece, fit perfectly into the whole system.

meanings.definition: A part or element of a larger whole.
meanings.sent1: The subcomponent of the necklace was a shiny gem.
meanings.sent2: Each subcomponent of the computer was carefully tested for quality.
meanings.sent3: The subcomponent made friends with the other parts of the machine.
meanings.sent4: His dedication was a subcomponent of his remarkable achievements.
meanings.sent5: The subcomponent, like a small gear, played a vital role in the clockwork of the project.
